about_the_game:
Tide Up is a rather dark and gloomy adventure game. Accompany the girl in a dreamlike world of wonder. Collect the pearls scattered around the world and help the girl escape!

Made with RPG Maker MV, this world is large and there’s a lot to see. Explore areas with different themes, and encounter neutral or hostile characters. There will be some hardships ahead, but solving the puzzles will show you the way.

Synopsis

A girl walking in the dark wakes up in a forest.

Help the girl leave this strange world.
